channel.title: How can i add the health around the minimap?
channel.description: In my server the only way to check your health is to go to your skills tab or just judge on your hp bar. how could i add the hp icon around the minimap?

item.title: How can i add the health around the minimap?

item.description:
@Ichase_Paper wrote:

Could you inform me on where these are, i have already used the “search feature” and obviously counldn’t find a tut on this subject thats why i posted it.

Read full topic
